content.prompt: The position of a particle moving in the xy-plane is given by the parametric equations x = t3 - 3t2 and y = 2t3 - 3t2 - 12t. For what values of t is the particle at rest?

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.4: (BC ONLY) Defining and Differentiating Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
